TopicTitle: Any tricks or mods who help you set Kerbin as an target?

Articles.Content: Game works very hard in preventing me from selecting Kerbin as an target for return trips. Its obvious that I want to select an probe landed on Minmus instead of Kerbin if I'm controlling another craft inside an other planet SOI or in inteplanetary space?
Select and focus whatever it lets you, zoom in on that, from there select the body. The additional step is annoying but it's possible.

As The Aziz points out, zoom in. It's incredibly hard for the devs to write code that basically goes like "when selecting an object from outside the SOI it's in, just pick the object that rendered the icon rendered on top, and not the body that defines the SOI" so we're stuck with that.

You can try a trick though: in the map view, use to filter button, click on "clear all" and then only select "celestial bodies." If that filter would actually filter what you see in the map, that would work.
